parameters.name: Condition
parameters.description: The filter conditions. Set this parameter to a JSON string in the format of {"field":"Name", "pattern":"configmap-"}.

parameters.name: Namespace
parameters.description: The namespace of the Kubernetes cluster.

parameters.name: PageNo
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Pages start from Page 0.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. The value 0 indicates that all entries are returned on one page.

parameters.name: ShowRelatedApps
parameters.description: Specifies whether to return a list of applications that use a Secret.
